document_data.name: Coral Burn
document_data.mainbody: '''''Coral burn''''' was a [[spell]] that was a variation of the ''[[heat metal]]'' spell.
document_data.Effects:
When cast, this spell began to heat up any exposed coral within {{SI|40|yd|long=yes}} from the caster. Any living coral was subsequently killed and the spell injured [[Dukar]] within the area of effect.

Immediately after the spell was cast, the coral became comfortably warm. However, it gradually increased in temperature, eventually becoming so hot it inflicted severe burns.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, this spell required a [[material component]].
